mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(M.MEMBER_ID) FROM MEMBER M JOIN STUDENT_INFO SI ON(M.MEMBER_ID=SI.STUDENT_NO) JOIN SDEPARTMENT S ON(SI.SDEPT_CODE =S.SDEPT_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_CHECK = '1' AND SI.SDEPT_CODE = ( SELECT P.PDEPT_CODE FROM MEMBER M JOIN PROFESSOR P ON(M.MEMBER_ID = P.PROFESSOR_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{professorId})

SELECT M.MEMBER_ID,M.MEMBER_KNAME,M.MEMBER_ENAME,M.MEMBER_NO,M.PHONE_ONE,M.PHONE_TWO,SI.STUDENT_STATUS,SI.GRADE,SI.ENROL_DATE FROM MEMBER M JOIN STUDENT_INFO SI ON(M.MEMBER_ID=SI.STUDENT_NO) JOIN SDEPARTMENT S ON(SI.SDEPT_CODE =S.SDEPT_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_CHECK = '1' AND SI.SDEPT_CODE = ( SELECT P.PDEPT_CODE FROM MEMBER M JOIN PROFESSOR P ON(M.MEMBER_ID = P.PROFESSOR_NO) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{professorId})
